hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) stood before Musailama (the liar) who was sitting with his companions then, and said to him, "If you ask me for this piece (of palm-leaf stalk), even then I would not give it to you. You cannot avoid what Allah has ordained for you, and if you turn away from Islam, Allah will surely ruin you

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {إِنَّمَا قَوْلُنَا لِشَىْءٍ إذا أردناه أن نقول له كن فيكون}
chapter.eng-name: “Verily! Our Word unto a thing when We intend it.…”
